statements: SELECT * FROM ProductLifeCycle
SELECT product_name, eco_impact_assessment FROM ProductLifeCycle WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT manufacturing_process FROM ProductLifeCycle WHERE product_name = 'Organic T-Shirt'
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM ProductLifeCycle ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM ProductLifeCycle WHERE eco_impact_assessment IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM ProductLifeCycle ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_process FROM ProductLifeCycle WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_process FROM ProductLifeCycle WHERE LENGTH(eco_impact_assessment) > 100;
SELECT * FROM ProductLifeCycle WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalProducts, SUM(LENGTH(eco_impact_assessment)) AS TotalEcoImpactLength FROM ProductLifeCycle;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, environmental_impact_score FROM products ORDER BY environmental_impact_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_result = 'Passed';
SELECT product_name, assessment_date FROM products p JOIN assessments a ON p.product_id = a.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, environmental_impact_score FROM products WHERE environmental_impact_score > 50 ORDER BY environmental_impact_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND environmental_impact_score < 30;
SELECT products.product_name, assessments.assessment_date FROM products JOIN assessments ON products.product_id = assessments.product_id ORDER BY assessments.assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_life_cycle;
SELECT product_id, product_name, life_cycle_stage FROM product_life_cycle WHERE carbon_footprint > 50;
SELECT assessment_id, product_id, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, strategy_description FROM product_strategy WHERE eco_friendly = true;
SELECT DISTINCT life_cycle_stage FROM product_life_cycle;
SELECT * FROM product_life_cycle ORDER BY product_name DESC, carbon_footprint ASC;
SELECT product_name, life_cycle_stage FROM product_life_cycle WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT pl.product_name, p.strategy_description FROM product_life_cycle pl INNER JOIN product_strategy p ON pl.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.eco_friendly = TRUE;

SELECT pl.product_name, p.assessment_date, e.energy_consumption FROM product_life_cycle pl INNER JOIN environmental_impact_assessment e ON pl.product_id = e.product_id WHERE e.energy_consumption > 500 ORDER BY e.energy_consumption DESC;

SELECT pl.life_cycle_stage, COUNT(e.assessment_id) AS assessment_count FROM product_life_cycle pl LEFT JOIN environmental_impact_assessment e ON pl.product_id = e.product_id GROUP BY pl.life_cycle_stage ORDER BY assessment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, created_at FROM Product ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpact WHERE impact_area = 'Water';
SELECT supplier, production_location, certification_status FROM GreenSupplyChain WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.name, l.material, e.impact_area FROM Product p JOIN LifeCycleAssessment l ON p.id = l.product_id JOIN EnvironmentalImpact e ON l.id = e.assessment_id WHERE e.impact_score > 80 ORDER BY e.impact_score DESC;

SELECT p.name, l.material, g.supplier, g.certification_status FROM Product p JOIN LifeCycleAssessment l ON p.id = l.product_id JOIN GreenSupplyChain g ON p.id = g.product_id WHERE g.certification_status = 'Certified';

SELECT p.name, p.price, e.impact_area, e.analysis_date FROM Product p JOIN LifeCycleAssessment l ON p.id = l.product_id JOIN EnvironmentalImpact e ON l.assessment_id = e.id WHERE e.impact_score < 50 ORDER BY e.analysis_date ASC;

SELECT p.name, l.energy_consumption, e.impact_area, g.supplier FROM Product p JOIN LifeCycleAssessment l ON p.id = l.product_id JOIN EnvironmentalImpact e ON l.id = e.assessment_id JOIN GreenSupplyChain g ON p.id = g.product_id WHERE l.energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY l.energy_consumption DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, weight FROM products WHERE weight < 5 ORDER BY weight;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location='USA';
SELECT id, name, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY name;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.name AS supplier_name, pr.quantity FROM products p JOIN purchases pr ON p.id = pr.product_id JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = pr.supplier_id;

SELECT DISTINCT p.name AS product_name, s.name AS supplier_name, pr.purchase_date FROM products p JOIN purchases pr ON p.id = pr.product_id JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = pr.supplier_id WHERE pr.quantity > 100;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, p.category, pur.quantity AS purchase_quantity, s.name AS supplier_name, s.location FROM products p LEFT JOIN purchases pur ON p.id = pur.product_id LEFT JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = pur.supplier_id;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, SUM(s.quantity) AS total_sales, AVG(e.carbon_footprint) AS avg_carbon_footprint FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id JOIN environmental_impact e ON p.id = e.product_id GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
